MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY17 postcode area of Llanwnog, affecting properties in Caersws and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.00PM to make repairs to faulty overhead line equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.03PM on 11th October 2020.
